title: JavaScript Introduction
details: JavaScript is the world's most popular programming language.JavaScript is the programming language of the Web.JavaScript is easy to learn.This tutorial will  teach you all.Examples in Each Chapter With our 'Try it Yourself' editor, you can edit the source code and view the result.

title: CSS Introduction
details: CSS is the language we use to style an HTML document.CSS is the language we use to style an HTML document.CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.CSS describes how HTML elements are to be displayed on screen, paper, or in other media.CSS saves a lot of work. It can control the layout of multiple web pages all at once.

title: JavaScript Where To Inserted
details: In HTML, JavaScript code is inserted between <script> and </script> tags. JavaScript is the default scripting language in HTML.A JavaScript function is a block of JavaScript code, that can be executed when 'called' for.For example, a function can be called when an event occurs, like when the user clicks a button.

title: HTML Introduction
details: HTML is the standard markup language for Web pages.With HTML you can create your own Website.HTML is easy to learn - You will enjoy it!

title: CSS aid
details: A CSS rule consists of a selector and a declaration block.The selector points to the HTML element you want to style.The declaration block contains one or more declarations separated by semicolons.Each declaration includes a CSS property name and a value, separated by a colon.Multiple CSS declarations are separated with semicolons, and declaration blocks are surrounded by curly braces.

title: What is HTML?
details: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language.HTML is standard markup language for creating Web page.

title: BOOtstrap Installation
details: Bootstrap 5 is the newest version of Bootstrap, which is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JavaScript framework for creating responsive, mobile-first websites.Bootstrap 5 is completely free to download and use!-------------------------------------------If you don't want to download and host Bootstrap 5 yourself, you can include it from a CDN (Content Delivery Network).

title: SQL introduction!
details: SQL is a standard language for storing, manipulating and retrieving data in databases.Our SQL tutorial will teach you how to use SQL in: MySQL, SQL Server, MS Access, Oracle, Sybase, Informix, Postgres, and other database systems.

title: 2 Things to do in Bootstrap
details: MUST use CDN..jsDelivr provides CDN support for Bootstrap's CSS and JavaScript.

title: JAVASCrIPT
details: JavaScript can 'display' data in different ways.Writing into an HTML element, using innerHTML.Writing into the HTML output using document.write().Writing into an alert box, using window.alert().

title: ‘Python introduction
details: Python is a popular programming language.Python can be used on a server to create web applications.Python is a computer programming language often used to build websites and software, automate tasks, and conduct data analysis. Python is a general-purpose language, meaning it can be used to create a variety of different programs and isn't specialized for any specific problems.

title: Python phase out sales of gas-powered cars
details: Python Install.Many PCs and Macs will have python already installed.To check if you have python installed on a Windows PC, search in the start bar for Python or run the following on the Command Line (cmd.exe):'C:Users/Your Name>python --version' --------------To check if you have python installed on a Linux or Mac, then on linux open the command line or on Mac open the Terminal and type: python --version .If you find that you do not have Python installed on your computer, then you can download it for free from the following website: https://www.python.org/--  ---'----Python QuickStart---Python is an interpreted programming language, this means that as a developer you write Python (.py) files in a text editor and then put those files into the python interpreter to be executed.
